column5:
Same here . Right now, everything hurts from the inside .I just can't deal anymore . I don't really know what to do to get better. Everything seems to get darker with each day passing .I'm afraid , really afraid . It seems like there's no way out this time  .
I'm afraid I'd lose everything. I feel like a loser, like an imposter .I cant seem to hide my difficulties from others anymore.My " crazy" shows .
